'Novell ZENworks', a suite of software products developed and maintained by
Novell, Inc. for computer systems management, aims to manage the entire life
cycle of servers, of desktop PCs (Windows or Linux), of laptops, and of handheld
devices such as personal digital assistants (PDAs). ZENworks recently included
full disk encryption functionality. [http://mediasyndicate.com/index.php?na-
me=News&file=article&sid=17370 SECUDE Provides Full Disk Encryption Capability
to Novell ZENworks] ZENworks supports multiple server platforms and
multiple directory services.
